analysis.description:
game.compare (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#203-228) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _player == 0 && _comp == 2
	- _player == 2 && _comp == 0
	- _player == _comp

game.compare (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#203-228) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _player == 0 && _comp == 2
	- _player == 2 && _comp == 0
	- _player == _comp
game.play_game (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#136-201) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- result == 2
	- result == 1
	- result == 0
	- random_player == random_lottery

game.play_game (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#136-201) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- result == 1 (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#163-166)
	- require(bool)(readyTime[msg.sender] < block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#137-140)
	- result == 0 (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#164-166)
	- result == 2 (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#147-166)

game.compare (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#203-228) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _player == 2 && _comp == 0 (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#218-227)
	- _player == 0 && _comp == 2 (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#217-227)
	- _player > _comp (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#223-227)
	- _player == _comp (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol#220-227)

game.view_readyTime (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= readyTime[_address] (/unique_contracts/0xccda5213d453388fb5fb43054bc261c8636b1e51.sol)
